command.description: A command the bot can perform.

man.description: Shows usage command info. Without any parameter shows list of all commands.

prefix.description:
Changes commands prefix.
'reset' restores default prefix.

poll.description: Creates poll. If no variants - creates yes/no poll. Maximum number of variants - 9.
poll.examples:
poll Am I the best bot?

poll 2x2?
4
5
I dunno...

role.description: Adds or removes role from specified member or applies to everyone in the voice channel with you.
role.role_should_be_lower: Your (and/or bot's) highest role should be higher than [{{- role}}]
role.you_are_not_in_voice_channel: You are not in a voice channel.

likerole.description:
Allows to add/remove role(s) by reacting with a specific emoji under message.
Maximum roles in 1 message is 20.
likerole.examples:
likerole create
üëç @role1 This role suits best for ...! 
ü§° @role2 If you like ... this role for you!

dynvoice.description:
Creates voice channels on demand with customizable name and permissions. Command creates channel-factory and when user joins it creates a new "managed" channel and moves user into it. Permissions inherits from factory. Name of new channel is special prefix + factory template. If no users left in a channel auto-remove it.
Parameters:
* [<category id>] - ID of a channel group to add a factory and managed channels
* [<limit>] - users limit for managed channel (0 - unlimited)
* [<template>] - Name of a managed channel
 - <user> is replaced by username
 - <game> is replaced by game in the status at the moment of creation
dynvoice.factory_created: Factory-Channel [{{- name}}] was created in the [{{- parent}}]

purge.description: Deletes last messages from a channel. Can be filtered by user.
purge.limit_exceeded_or_not_number: Exceed limit of handling messages ({{max}}) or not a number.

sentry.description: Observes current channel and sets emoji for every message if they are written by a single person in a sequence. If a person blocks the bot - deletes last two messages and rewrite them into one.
sentry.off: No law in this wild channel anymore!

pause.description: Pauses handling of all events but commands.

permissions.bot_requires_core_permissions: Bot doesn't have required core permissions in channel [#{{channel}}] on server [{{server}}].
permissions.user_requires_permissions: You don't have required permissions in channel [#{{channel}}] on server [{{server}}].
permissions.VIEW_CHANNEL: Read Text Channels & See Voice Channels
